attributes.additional_details:
The  Governments proposed 'Snoopers Charter';
is merely a device to bring about Greater and greater dictatorship In Britain. It has nothing to do with terrorism except that of terrorising, bullying and victimising law abiding people. Only the people who want a Police State use these kinds of methods.
The Government already snoop on everybody now.
Where is our Control and Snooping of the Government?
They are already controlling most of the media now and now they want to control every individual too.
